org.apache.camel.builder

Class AdviceWithTasks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.camel.builder.AdviceWithTasks

  • public final class AdviceWithTasks
extends Object
    AdviceWithTask tasks which are used by the AdviceWithRouteBuilder.
